name: Dynamic Attributes
description:
For additional information on dynamic attributes, please refer to BP-5381. (https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/BP-5381)
The most efficient way to test dynamic attributes is to use Charles remap the event data responses from ticketing-client (Ballpark Tab) and boxoffice (Ticket Tab). Locate the section in the json "dynamicAttribute": and replace the values as needed. Refresh the view in Ballpark to confirm the app is correctly using the new values over the default ones.
